subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer of the United States kept his overall lead in the Dauphiné Libéré while Iban Mayo of Spain won the next-to-last stage of this warm-up race for the Tour de France in July.
snippet: Levi Leipheimer of the United States kept his overall lead in the Dauphiné Libéré while Iban Mayo of Spain won the next-to-last stage of this warm-up race for the Tour de France in July.
